title: Rules Appendix
intro: This appendix summarizes the current test-harness rules as implemented.

SNAP_ATTACK.name: Snap Attack
SNAP_ATTACK.desc: Ranged attack step resolved before movement (fast shots). Uses current measured range at that step.

ADVANCE.name: Advance
ADVANCE.desc: Move up to 9" (minus movement penalties) toward the plotted Advance waypoint, pathing around impassable terrain if possible.

ROTATE_ION_SHIELDS.name: Rotate Ion Shields
ROTATE_ION_SHIELDS.desc: Until the end of this turn, gain +1 to Armour Saves from all directions. Your Ion Shield always protects the Front arc: ranged attacks hitting your Front arc grant a 4+ Ion Save that ignores AP and cover (roll Ion first; if it fails, roll the normal 5+ Armour Save with AP + cover). If the Tilting Shield location is critically destroyed, you cannot Rotate Ion Shields and you lose your Ion Save.

STANDARD_ATTACK.name: Standard Attack
STANDARD_ATTACK.desc: Primary ranged attack step. Uses measured range at this point in the action chain.

RUN.name: Run
RUN.desc: Roll 2D6 and move that many inches (minus movement penalties). Waypoint-aware: finishes earlier waypoints first, then continues toward the Run waypoint.

AIMED_ATTACK.name: Aimed Attack
AIMED_ATTACK.desc: Precision ranged attack step that happens after Run. Uses measured range after all prior movement steps.

CHARGE.name: Charge
CHARGE.desc: Move up to 6" (minus penalties) toward waypoints, then resolve melee attacks if the target is in weapon reach and LOS is not blocked by cover.

items.text: Impassable. Ranged attacks cannot be made through it if LOS crosses its area. Blocks melee as well.
Impassable. Ranged attacks can be made through it, but the target gains Cover (+1 to armour saves) if LOS crosses it. Blocks melee as well.
Hard Cover is red-tinted blocks. Soft Cover is blue-tinted blocks.

items.name: Arms (Critical)
items.effect: If both critical cells on an arm are damaged, that arm’s weapons are disabled.

items.name: Tilting Shield (Critical)
items.effect: Cannot choose Rotate Ion Shields and loses the Ion Save (Front arc).

items.name: Head (Critical)
items.effect: Max Action Points is reduced to 2.

items.name: Indirect
items.effect: This weapon ignores LOS for determining if it can fire. If it does not have LOS (hard cover blocks LOS), it always fires as a Snap Shot. Weapons with Indirect: Ironstorm Missile Pod.

weapons.heading: Weapon profiles
weapons.note: Thermal cannon automatically uses the half-range profile at ≤10" and max-range profile at ≤20".
